model_input:

Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:

[Task]

Classmates A is driven by a desire to help people and make a difference in the world. They have a crush on Classmates B, who admires their dedication to science and encourages them to pursue their passions.

Classmates A and Classmates B share a great connection and enjoy talking to each other. Classmates A has developed a crush on Classmates B, who feels flattered by the attention. They are looking forward to getting to know each other better and are planning to grab lunch together later.

Event Description:
Classmates A is excited about seeing Lady Gaga in concert, as it will be their fourth time attending one of her shows. They love Lady Gaga's music and message of acceptance and inclusivity. Classmates B, who is interested in biology, has never been to one of Lady Gaga's concerts before but thinks "Bad Romance" is a great song. Classmates A's favorite Lady Gaga song is "Born This Way."
